thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: Gail
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Gail

author: Gail
title: Gail
text: I had an issue with a corner suite of furniture purchased from Harvey Norman. on receipt of the furniture I called Customer Service thinking that I would have a battle on my hands over the issue, how wrong was I - the customer support and in-store staff couldn't have been nicer to deal with and gave me multiple options to help rectify the issue. Suffice to say this issue has now been dealt with in a professional and timely manner and fully resolved. It is so refreshing to deal with professional and approachable people - I would definitely purchase from Harvey Norman again totally off the back of their customer service being so good (a rarity these days)
